auth.login_description: Enter your email and password below to log in
auth.forgot_password_description: Enter your email to receive a password reset link
auth.register_description: Enter your details to get started
auth.confirm_password_description: This is a secure area of the application. Please confirm your password before continuing.
auth.reset_password_description: Choose a new password to secure your account
auth.verify_email_description: Please verify your email address by clicking the link we just emailed you.
auth.resend_sent: A new verification link has been sent to your email address.
auth.two_factor_description: Enter the authentication code provided by your authenticator application.
auth.two_factor_recovery_description: Confirm access to your account by entering one of your emergency recovery codes.

profile.title: Profile information
profile.description: Update your name and email address

photo.title: Profile photo
photo.hint: PNG, JPG, or GIF up to 5MB.
photo.new: New photo selected - save to apply
photo.upload_hint: Or drag and drop here. Preview updates immediately.

verify.resend: Click here to resend the verification email.
verify.sent: A new verification link has been sent to your email address.

delete.title: Delete account
delete.description: Delete your account and all of its resources
delete.warning_detail: Please proceed with caution, this cannot be undone.
delete.confirm_title: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
delete.confirm_body: Once your account is deleted, all of its resources and data will also be permanently deleted. Please enter your password to confirm you would like to permanently delete your account.

password.title: Update password
password.description: Ensure your account is using a long, random password to stay secure

appearance.title: Appearance settings
appearance.description: Update the site name and logo
appearance.branding_subtitle: Upload a logo to show in the app header and sidebar.
appearance.upload_hint: PNG, JPG, or GIF up to 5MB. Drag & drop or click to browse.

two_factor_settings.title: Two-Factor Authentication
two_factor_settings.enabled_copy: With two-factor authentication enabled, you will be prompted for a secure, random pin during login, which you can retrieve from the TOTP-supported application on your phone.
two_factor_settings.disabled_copy: When you enable two-factor authentication, you will be prompted for a secure pin during login. This pin can be retrieved from a TOTP-supported application on your phone.

recovery.title: 2FA Recovery Codes
recovery.description: Recovery codes let you regain access if you lose your 2FA device. Store them in a secure password manager.
recovery.label: Recovery Codes
recovery.warning: Each recovery code can be used once to access your account and will be removed after use. If you need more, click {action} above.

setup.enabled_description: Two-factor authentication is now enabled. Scan the QR code or enter the setup key in your authenticator app.
setup.verify_description: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app
setup.enable_description: To finish enabling two-factor authentication, scan the QR code or enter the setup key in your authenticator app

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your profile and account settings

welcome.title: Anything Starter
welcome.subtitle: The modern Laravel + React starter kit
welcome.hero_subtitle: A production-ready Laravel 12 + Inertia + React 19 + TypeScript starter kit. Batteries included, fully customizable.
welcome.features_title: Everything you need to ship faster
welcome.features_subtitle: Fully-featured authentication, beautiful UI components, and developer-friendly tooling.
welcome.feature_auth_desc: Email verification, password resets, two-factor authentication, and profile management built-in.
welcome.feature_ui_desc: 25+ shadcn/ui components with Tailwind CSS v4. Dark mode and responsive design included.
welcome.feature_i18n_desc: Built-in English and Khmer support with Kantumruy Pro font. Easy to add more languages.
welcome.feature_dx_desc: TypeScript, Vite HMR, typed routes, auto-imports, and React 19 with compiler optimization.
welcome.feature_realtime_desc: Laravel Reverb integration with Echo for WebSocket connections and live updates.
welcome.feature_deployment_desc: Works with Laravel Cloud, Forge, Vapor, or any PHP hosting. SSR support included.

admin.title: User management
admin.description: Create users, assign roles, and manage permissions

table.delete_user_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete {name}? This action cannot be undone.

roles_section.title: Roles & permissions
roles_section.delete_role_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete {role}? This will remove the role and detach it from all users.

feed.title: Feed
feed.empty: No posts yet. Be the first to share something!
feed.placeholder: Share an update with your team...
feed.share_dialog_description: Add an optional message before posting this share.
feed.view_image_description: Open the full-size image in a modal.
feed.edit_description: Update the content or image of your post.
